title: 12/17/2020 - HOUR 1 - Saints, playoffs, Heisman, MVP
itunes:title: 12/17/2020 - HOUR 1 - Saints, playoffs, Heisman, MVP
description:
Drew Brees still being injured is actually a good thing for the Saints

The problem with wanting a bigger college playoff

Colin explains why you wouldn't want to win the Heisman or MVP

If the NFL playoffs started today


Guest: Ryen Russillo
